Around Others.name: Starting an Argument
Around Others.effect: Use their relations, stories and past events to logically decide which team member makes the most sense.

Around Others.name: Isolating or Seeking Solace
Around Others.effect: The character withdraws as much as possible—both physically and psychologically. Whether they lock themself away or grab the nearest bottle of whisky is up to the player or GM.

Around Others.name: Becoming Anxious
Around Others.effect: The character succumbs to anxiety, making things clearly worse for others. Everyone gains 1 Stress and the character is of little help.

Around Others.name: Lashing Out
Around Others.effect: The character not only starts an argument but becomes actively aggressive, potentially causing a fight.

Around Others.name: Becoming Uncooperative
Around Others.effect: The character blames others for their current situation, becoming stubborn and unwilling to cooperate.

Alone.name: Hyper Focusing
Alone.effect: The character chooses a hyper-focus activity. They gain +5 to any rolls associated with it, but suffer -5 to any other activity.

Alone.name: Timing Out
Alone.effect: The character needs to take a break. They spend a whole Time Track reset trying to calm themself.

Alone.name: Anxiety
Alone.effect: The character feels overwhelmed by the current events, suffering -2 to all checks.

Alone.name: Binging or Hyperventilating
Alone.effect: If aboard a ship, the character attempts to distract themself by eating until they can’t take another bite (-D6 Rations). If exploring, the character starts hyperventilating, rapidly consuming oxygen before they manage to calm themself (-D4 Oxygen Pellets).

Alone.name: Getting Overwhelmed
Alone.effect: The character is starting to reach their limit and is feeling less and less secure. Their Resolve checks are at -2 for the rest of the mission.
